'''John Tolkien''' can refer to the following people:
*[[John Tolkien]], son of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
*'''[[J.R.R. Tolkien|John Ronald Reuel Tolkien]],''' more commonly known as J.R.R. Tolkien.
*[[John Benjamin Tolkien]], grandfather of J.R.R. Tolkien.
*[[John Benjamin Tolkien (George's father)|John Benjamin Tolkien]], great-great-grandfather of J.R.R. Tolkien.
